title: 服务端好像不行啊PaperSpigot
author: djjawdjawhd
txt_content:
到官网下的PaperSpigot服务端
试好几次都不行
就是启动时出现的报错
下边有报错

有会解决的不

Downloading original jar...
Error downloading original jar
java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed
        at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method)
        at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source)
        at sun.security.ssl.InputRecord.readFully(Unknown Source)
        at sun.security.ssl.InputRecord.read(Unknown Source)
        at sun.security.ssl.SSLSocketImpl.readRecord(Unknown Source)
        at sun.security.ssl.SSLSocketImpl.performInitialHandshake(Unknown Source)
        at sun.security.ssl.SSLSocketImpl.startHandshake(Unknown Source)
        at sun.security.ssl.SSLSocketImpl.startHandshake(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsClient.afterConnect(Unknown Source)

        at com.destroystokyo.paperclip.Main.main(Main.java:14)

replies.author: Ariy
replies.txt_content:
你下载的是buildtools吧？
可以在这个网站下载到paper的核心https://mirror.ssr.wine/#PaperSpigot

replies.author: djjawdjawhd
replies.txt_content:
tian_wc 发表于 2018-11-19 21:24
